table.name: report
table.description: The REPORT table contains the list of standard and customized reports.  One record per report.

columns.name: REPORT_GID
columns.description: GC3 Global indetifier for the entity. Is created by concatenating Domain Name,'.' and XID.

columns.name: REPORT_DESC
columns.description: Report description.

columns.name: REPORT_GROUP_GID
columns.description: GC3 Global indetifier for the entity. Is created by concatenating Domain Name,'.' and XID.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Domain of the User. Is used for creating the GID.

columns.name: REPORT_XID
columns.description: GC3 Unique indetifier for the entity. Is used for creating the GID

columns.name: REPORT_DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the report that will appear in the GC3 application.

columns.name: REPORT_PHYSICAL_NAME
columns.description: The actual file name of the report.

columns.name: ADDITIONAL_URL_ARGUMENTS
columns.description: Contains any additional URL arguments that should be called when the report is called within the GC3 application.

columns.name: CAN_AUTO_GENERATE
columns.description: Specifies if the report can be included in a report set.  Generally only the reports that take a shipment_gid or order_base_gid as its parameter may only be set for auto generation.

columns.name: SECURITY_LEVEL
columns.description: If a value is present, it specifies the security level when sending the report.  If no value is present, the default is taken from the properties file.

columns.name: IS_RPT_MGR_DISPLAY
columns.description: Flag that defines whether this report will appear on the Report Manager screen or not.  Valid values are Y and N.

columns.name: REPORT_FROM_DB
columns.description: Default database name on which the report should be run.

columns.name: SEED_DATA
columns.description: Specifies if the Report is a seed data.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: For audit trail purposes. This field stores the id of the user who first entered the record.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: For audit trail purposes. This field stores the date and time when the record was first entered in the database.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: For audit trail purposes. This field stores the id of the user who last updated the record.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: For audit trail purposes. This field stores the date and time when the record was updated in the database.

columns.name: USE_PARAMS_AS_BIND
columns.description: Flag to determine whether to build the report parameters into valid SQL value(s) to be used as bind values or to use the finder string value(s).

columns.name: THIRD_PARTY_CONTENT_TYPE
columns.description: Type of support for 3rd party report generation

columns.name: USE_THIRD_PARTY_DISTRIBUTION
columns.description: Flag to control whether a 3rd party is responsible for report distribution

columns.name: REPORT_SYSTEM_GID
columns.description: Report System generating the report. If left blank, embedded BI Publisher is used.

columns.name: REPORT_PATH
columns.description: The path of the report. Report systems use this path, along with a path prefix to determine which report to generate.

columns.name: USE_PARAM_OPERATORS
columns.description: Flag specifying whether finder operators should be used for report parameters. Note that this is independent of use_params_as_bind. That flag determines whether the report parses whatever arguments it receives and uses bind variables for queries. You can have a report that uses bind variables and finder operators, or one that uses concatenation without operators.

columns.name: DATA_QUERY_TYPE_GID
columns.description: Data query type associated with the report. Used for optional document storage.
